_description: The Coronation of the Virgin — seven 8-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Ecce virgo radix Iesse’

BLAdd20059.First Lines:
The infinite power essentiallMe thought I sawe
                    verrement…
BLAdd20059.Last Lines:
…There to love our godd most gloriousEcce virgo, radix
                    Jesse
BLAdd20059.Note:
Nineteenth century transcript by Hunter: London,  British Library Addit. 24542, f.
                    180.
